abstract: Herbalife plans to give two board seats to Carl C. Icahn, as the health supplements maker further binds itself to its most outspoken outside defender of late.
snippet: Herbalife plans to give two board seats to Carl C. Icahn, as the health supplements maker further binds itself to its most outspoken outside defender of late.
lead_paragraph: Herbalife said on Thursday that it planned to give two board seats to Carl C. Icahn, as the health supplements maker further binds itself to its most outspoken outside defender of late.

headline.main: Icahn Gains 2 Seats on Herbalife’s Board

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
